entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
